1: Directive 2009/28/EC of the European Parliament and the Council of 23 April 2009 on the promotion of the use of energy from renewable sources and amending and subsequently repeaing Directive 2007/77/EC and 2003/30/EC.
2: Report from the commission to the Council and the European Parliament on sustainability requirements for the use of solid and gaseous biomass resources in electricity, heating and cooling; Brussels, 25-02-2010; COM(2010) final.
5: JEC E3-database (version 31/7/2008) - fuel, electricity, gas emission & fuel efficiency.
9: CoM Default Emission Factors for the Member States of the European Union.
10: COMMUNICATION FROM THE COMMISSION TO THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT, THE COUNCIL, THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL COMMITTEE AND THE COMMITTEE OF THE REGIONS.
units1: Equivalent CO2 emmission from the national electricity
units2: Equivalent CO2 emmission from the PV energy
units3: Equivalent CO2 emmission from the wind energy
units4: Equivalent CO2 emmission from the hydro energy
units6: CO2 emited per MJ by diesel combustion
units7: CO2 emited per MJ by natural gas combustion
units10: MJ of energy produced by the truck while usind diesel for the transport of dry products
units11: The equivalent CO2 emmission from a truck while transporting dry products
units12: MJ of energy produced by the truck while usind diesel for the transport of liquid products
units13: The equivalent CO2 emmission from a the truck while transporting liquid products
units14: Lower Heating Value of demolished wood
units17: Equivalent ammount of CO2 produced by a 10 years old tree in it's lifecycle
units18: The equivialent ammount of CO2 emmited by a house per year
